com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdIdReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdIdReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdReference
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DOMIdReference, JaxpIdReference

    public class StdIdReference
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdReference
    Immutable implementation of the IdReference interface.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdIdReference(Identifier idIn)
      Creates a new StdIdReference with the given Identifier representing the XACML PolicyId or PolicySetId.
      StdIdReference(Identifier idIn, Version versionIn)
      Creates a new StdIdReference with the given Identifier representing the XACML PolicyId or PolicySetId, and the given Version representing the PolicyVersion or PolicySetVersion.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Implementations of the IdReference interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two IdReferences (i1 and i2) are equal if: i1.getId().equals(i2.getId()) AND i1.getVersion().equals(i2.getVersion())
      Identifier getId()
      Returns the Identifier representing the XACML PolicyId or PolicySetId that is referenced by this IdReference.
      Version getVersion()
      Returns the Version of the XACML Policy or PolicySet referenced by this IdReference.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
